# Concepts Docs

## Programming concepts

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/programming-guide/concepts/index.md): Use the resources in this section to understand programming concepts in the C# language, including object-oriented programming.
- [Iterators](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/programming-guide/concepts/iterators.md): Learn how to use an iterator to step through collections like lists and arrays. Iterators are consumed from client code using a foreach statement or LINQ query.

## Children

- [Covariance Contravariance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/programming-guide/concepts/covariance-contravariance/llms.txt)
